titles.title: Nuclear Waste Transportation Prohibition Through Urbanized Areas Act of 1987
A bill etitled the "Nuclear Waste Transportation Prohibition through Urbanized Areas Act of 1987".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 3/25/1987--Introduced. Nuclear Waste Transportation Prohibition Through Urbanized Areas Act of 1987 - Prohibits the transportation of high level radioactive waste or spent nuclear fuel by or for the Department of Energy to any temporary or permanent storage facility operated by or for such Department through an area designated as an urbanized area if the affected local government can identify a safer route.
